My favorite thing to do in my free time is to volunteer at an animal shelter

I'm an adult who likes to have some time to myself.

content.text: Doing well! I just got back from volunteering at an animal shelter. It's my favorite thing to do in my free time.
Oh, that's awesome! What kind of animals do you like to work with?
All of them! But I especially love dogs. I have a dog of my own, and he's the best thing in my life. What about you, do you have any pets?
I do! I have a little dog named Milo, he's a chihuahua. He's so cute and cuddly. How old is your dog?
Milo is 10 years old! He's still a puppy at heart though. He loves to play fetch and go for walks.
That's awesome! Dogs are the best.
I know right! They're so loyal and loving.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to dress up and go out, I also love to drive.
Sounds like we have a few things in common! I like to dress up too, and I love to go for drives.
That's awesome! Maybe we can go for a drive sometime?
That would be fun! I'm free this weekend.
Great! I'll text you my number and we can figure out a time to meet up.
